thread.title: Sahara: To recover dues from Sahara, Supreme Court attaches company’s Aamby Valley Pune project
thread.title_full: Sahara: To recover dues from Sahara, Supreme Court attaches company’s Aamby Valley Pune project - The Economic Times

author: Samanwaya Rautray
title: Sahara: To recover dues from Sahara, Supreme Court attaches company’s Aamby Valley Pune project
text:
EW DELHI: The Supreme Court on Monday ordered that the Sahara group 's Aamby Valley project near Pune be attached in a bid to force the group to pay up a balance of dues up to Rs 14799 crore. 

This means that the property shall pass into the courts custody. 

The Sahara group has offered to pay this amount by July 2019. But a bench led by Justice Dipak Misra ordered the attachment to speed up the process of recovery. 

Group chief Subrata Roy will however stay out for parole till he submitted a list of properties free of encumbrances to be auctioned. The court will hear the case again on February 27. 

The Rs 14000 crore is balance of the principal to be paid. The interest amounts to an equivalent figure.
